label: AdvancePayment
comment: A prepaid discharge of obligations in respect of funds or securities transferred between two or more parties.

datatypeProperties.comment: A tax included in this advance payment.
A monetary value paid or to be paid for this instalment payment.
The date, time, date time, or other date time value when information related to this transport event was received, from the perspective of the receiver.

referencedBy.comment: A prepaid discharge of obligations in respect of funds or securities transferred between two or more parties.
